settings.update.title: Update frequency

settings.cpu.title: Processor

settings.drives.title: Drives
settings.gpu.desc: Whether the graphics card (GPU) should be monitored
settings.gpu.title: Graphics card
settings.temperature.desc: Whether the temperature sensors should be monitored

settings.fan.desc: Whether the fans should be monitored
settings.fan.title: Fan
settings.network.desc: Whether network activity should be monitored

settings.ram.desc: Whether the system memory (RAM) should be monitored

settings.battery.desc: Whether the battery should be monitored
settings.battery.title: Battery
settings.argus.desc: Whether Argus Monitor specific metrics should be retrieved
settings.argus.title: Argus Monitor
settings.delay.desc: Optional delay before initializing and querying sensors (in seconds)

settings.poll_delay.desc: Delay after initializing before polling the sensors for the first time (in seconds)
settings.poll_delay.title: Poll delay
